entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
